ModMetaData.name: Expanded Materials-Concrete Barricade
ModMetaData.author: Uaine Teine
ModMetaData.description:
v1.1.1
Why make a simple wooden barricade when concrete is available and a stronger and quick setting material.
This mod adds a fortified barricade to the security tab: - standard size (1x1) - extended Hitpoints: 440 - quicker to build: 220 work - flameproof
Unlockable with research after concrete making.
Also patches in a variant of the barricade that can be built out of rock powder, no stat differences.
Requirements: - Expanded Materials - Metals
